section.title: EVMDeleteVmByName
section.para: EVMDeleteVmbyName looks up a VirtualMachine by name and deletes it from the VMDB.

note.para: This method will likely be changed or deleted in the future.

listitem.para: Input: Name of the Virtual Machine as a string.

formalpara.title: Examples
formalpara.para: The following examples demonstrate EVMDeleteVmByName usage:

example.title: EVMDeleteVmByName WSDL
example.programlisting: <message name="EVMDeleteVmByName"> <part name="vmName" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="EVMDeleteVmByNameResponse"> <part name="return" type="xsd:boolean"/> </message>
